## PdfDestinationObject.zoom property

**Signature:**

```typescript
zoom: {
        mode: PdfZoomMode.Unknown;
    } | {
        mode: PdfZoomMode.XYZ;
        params: {
            x: number;
            y: number;
            zoom: number;
        };
    } | {
        mode: PdfZoomMode.FitPage;
    } | {
        mode: PdfZoomMode.FitHorizontal;
    } | {
        mode: PdfZoomMode.FitVertical;
    } | {
        mode: PdfZoomMode.FitRectangle;
    };
```
